name: @nginx-love/cloudflare-manager-plugin
description: Cloudflare DNS and Firewall management plugin for Nginx WAF

scripts.build: tsc index.ts --outDir . --module commonjs --target es2020 --esModuleInterop true && tsc services/cloudflare-client.ts --outDir services --module commonjs --target es2020

author: Nginx Love Team <dev@nginxlove.com>
